info.name: Strapi LMS API
info.description: Complete API collection for a Strapi v5 LMS backend. Replace placeholder values with your own credentials.

request.description: Login as admin to get admin panel token
Login as a student user
Login as an instructor user
Register a new user account
Get currently authenticated user
List all course categories (public)
Get a single category by ID
List all tags (public)
List all published courses (public)
Filter courses by difficulty and price
Get paginated and sorted courses
Get a single course by ID
Get course with related data populated
Search courses by title (case insensitive)
Get course by slug with populated relations. Supports: thumbnail, category, tags, instructor, modules, previewVideo, quizzes
Get courses with populated relations. Allowed: thumbnail, category, tags, instructor, modules, previewVideo
List all modules with course and lessons. Allowed populate: course, lessons
Get modules for a specific course
Get a single module with lessons
List all lessons with module. Allowed populate: module, contentItems, quiz
Get lessons for a specific module
Get a single lesson with content
List all quizzes with course and questions. Allowed populate: course, questions, lesson
Get a quiz with all questions
List all questions with quiz. Allowed populate: quiz
List all content items (requires auth)
Get student's dashboard with enrolled courses and progress
Browse courses with optional filters
Enroll in a course
Get user's course enrollments with course and user data. Allowed populate: course, user, invitedBy
Update progress for a lesson
Submit answers for a quiz
Get student's earned certificates
Get progress records for a course
Get instructor's dashboard with course stats
Get all courses created by instructor

body.raw:
{ "data": { "title": "New Course Title", "slug": "new-course-title", "description": "

Course description here

", "shortDescription": "Short description", "difficulty": "beginner", "visibility": "public", "status": "draft", "isFree": false, "price": 49.99, "duration": 1800, "allowSelfEnrollment": true, "certificateEnabled": true, "category": "category-document-id" } }

request.description: Create a new course
Update an existing course
Get all students enrolled in a course
Create a new module
Create a new lesson

body.raw:
{ "data": { "title": "Module 1 Quiz", "description": "Test your knowledge", "instructions": "

Answer all questions

", "type": "quiz", "passingScore": 70, "maxAttempts": 3, "timeLimit": 30, "isTimed": true, "shuffleQuestions": true, "showCorrectAnswers": true, "isRequired": true, "course": "course-document-id" } }

request.description: Create a new quiz
Create a new question
Send course invitation to a student
Get analytics for a specific course
Get admin dashboard statistics
Get all users in the system
Update a user's role
Get all enrollments in the system
Bulk enroll multiple users in a course
Get detailed analytics for a course
Generate reports
Get all certificates with user and course populated. Supports pagination and filtering by status, courseId, userId.
Revoke a certificate
Publicly verify a certificate by code
List all invites
Redeem an invite code to enroll in a course
Get user profiles
Update a user profile
Get quiz attempts
Get a single quiz attempt
